SEARCH
Package Accounts

Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Accounts.Employee
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, BranchManager, Staff
public abstract class Employee extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a generic employee with a name, staff ID, user type, gender, and age. This class provides the structure for employees and must be subclassed to handle specific employee roles.
See Also:

    • db

      protected InMemoryDatabase db

  • Constructor Details

    • Employee

      public Employee(String name, String staffID, UserType userType, char gender, int age, InMemoryDatabase db)
      Constructs a new Employee with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the employee.
      staffID - the staff ID of the employee.
      userType - the UserType of the employee.
      gender - the gender of the employee, represented as a char ('M' or 'F').
      age - the age of the employee.
      db - the database instance for the employee to interact with.

      The current name of the employee.

    • getBranchName

      public abstract String getBranchName()
      Abstract method to get the branch name associated with the employee. Implementations of this method should return the name of the branch where the employee works.
      Returns:
      the name of the branch as a String.
